name: h4c-monorepo
description: H4C Discord bot and web platform monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web && npm run build:bot
scripts.build:shared: npm --prefix shared run build || echo 'No build script in shared'
scripts.build:bot: npm --prefix bot run build || echo 'No build script in bot'
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:web && npm run test:bot
scripts.test:shared: npm --prefix shared test || echo 'No tests in shared'
scripts.test:bot: npm --prefix bot test || echo 'No tests in bot'
scripts.test:integration: node tests/smoke.js && node tests/integration-award.js && node tests/integration-markdown.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:bot
scripts.lint:shared: npm --prefix shared run lint || echo 'No lint script in shared'
scripts.lint:bot: npm --prefix bot run lint || echo 'No lint script in bot'
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:shared -- --fix && npm run lint:web -- --fix && npm run lint:bot -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:bot
scripts.type-check:bot: echo "Bot is JavaScript - no type checking needed"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:builds
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm --prefix shared ci && npm --prefix web ci && npm --prefix bot ci
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:security && npm run fix:dependencies
